price: Яна олдингидек бўлди. Дарҳақиқат, Биз унинг барча ишларидан воқифмиз.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
